reviews.review: Я думаю про эту игру не надо писать большой обзор, потому что в неё играли большинство геймеров и знают ее наизусть. Valve посторались создать шедевр и у них вышло. Моя оценка ∞/10

First I want to tell you that don't let my playtime fool you...I had previously owned Half-Life 2, let's get to the review!
 I love the ragdoll physics of this game and the way you can experiment with them.I also like the puzzles of this game that make it slightly more fun.I had fun unfolding the story and generally it has one of the most well-written videogame stories.I enjoyed the way which valve equiped you with weaponary and the variety of the weaponary.In conclusion, I believe this is the best First-Person-Shooter Adventure game of all time...Tottaly recommend!!!
very good lets count to 3?

The best game in the Half-Life series by far, this is an upgrade from the original.

Being the second in the series, the one with the better graphics and gameplay.

Variety of tasks and "levels" are in your way, with the main aspect of Half-Life still intact. If you loved the first one, you'll love this one! Would recommend to all PC gamers.
Honestly it is the best game ever made. (On the box btw multiple awards have also been given). Anyone who buys this should also get the (Orange Box).

玩这游戏几小时，晕这游戏几小时
尤其是第四章，那船颠簸的，把我晚饭都吐出来了...

You're probably jumping in to the fire writing a review for Half-Life 2, one of the series with the biggest fan base overall in the videogame world. But I just like to practise my writing as my english and write reviews.

I have to say I haven't played Half-Life yet, I have Black Mesa and the chapters so I may edit the review then (I read which happened on Half-Life 1 so I will talk from there).

It's a 2004 game even if the graphics are not great today the game looks fantastic for that year, the gameplay is solid as it is the movement. It's incredible how fine you can move around the areas (except when alies appears, they just want to se the world in flames). Physics are part incredible part frustrating but it's not something you're going to be aware of playing. 

The game as a shooter is great, for the money of a burguer you have the opportunity to play it, I'm really sure you won't regret your decision if you buy it. About the story I recommend you to play the game for yourself,[b] after playing Half-Life 2 I'm on the hype train for Half-Life 3.[/b]

Coś świetnego, po prostu w tamtych czasach gierka musiała rozwalać innowacją i świeżością. Ciekawa fabuła, świat zaprojektowany tak, że wszystko tam żyje, cały czas się dzieje. Mega realityczna rzecz, i dawno nie widziałem żeby któraś z nowszych gier miała tak ciekawie zaprojektowany świat. Mimo lat na karku gierka nadal godna polecenia, klasyk.

There is a reason this is hailed as one of the best games of all time. The storyline is top notch, the gameplay never gets stale, and the game is @#$% HUGE. It's constantly changing things up. There are puzzles, diverse enemies, and plenty of interesting game elements that you still don't see in games yet.
Just... great...

Half life 2 is the magnum opus of all video games. Half life 2 is one of the best games I have ever experienced, its gameplay is fun and invigorating, and it doesnt fall into the pits most shooters do nowadays. its great, 10/10.
This is by far one of the greatest games of all time. If you haven't played it, your missing out.
La historia es bastante buena. El gameplay es excelente.

Mi juego favorito, sin duda alguna. Una tremenda historia sin final... ¿Quién o qué es G-Man?¿Qué pasa con el Borealis?¿Cómo saben los vortigaunts en qué momento aparecer?. Tantas incógnitas sin resolver tras 10 años de espera. No puedo darle "No recomendado", es el juego que me hizo comprender que los videojuegos son un arte. Un juego completo, tiene puzzles, shooter, plataformas, survival horror, conducción, personajes que de verdad enganchan, una historia acojonantemente buena... Pero Valve ha preferido dejarlo de lado, olvidado... DEP la franquicia de Half-Life 1999-2007.
Моя игруля детства. :З
Bel gioco.
虽然很经典，但是对于我来说游戏过于古老，很不习惯种种，但是他是爸爸级别的fps游戏毫无疑问。

Жаль, что я в этот шедевр мне удалось поиграть так поздно! Были маленькие косяки, но они практически не мешали наслаждению от сего творения. Предраться почти не к чему, даже сейчас геймплей в халфе очень хороши и сильно затягивают. Сюжет, персонажи,  графика (сейчас смотрится старо, но учитывая возраст игры, возмности сурса удивляют даже сегодня)- всё на своём месте и выглядит добротно! Просто, нет слов. Valve, побольше бы от вас таких игр.
